description.name: cbbtcsol
description.tagline: CBBTC Solana Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto sol-cbbtc Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept CBBTC Solana directly on your website
Unique sol/cbbtc receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your sol/cbbtc wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
